data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Rakai, Uganda to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 5,683 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rakai, Uganda
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 2,818 believers in Rakai, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 1 new simple churches in the state of Rakai, Uganda. Place a simple church in every community of the 8,500 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,438 who are far from you in Rakai, Uganda from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Nubian people. Make the Nubian people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Rakai, Uganda, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Rakai, Uganda.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Rakai to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

location.name: Rakai
location.people_groups_list: Nyang'i, Amba, Karamojong, Swahili, Chinese, general
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Nyang'i (18,000), Amba (54,000), Karamojong (849,000), Swahili (5,100), Chinese, general (19,000)
